Description.Text: Zydroji Liepsna is a charming 3-star hotel offering spacious accommodation in the heart of Palanga. Highlights include onsite dining, a whirlpool, steam room and a good location close to the beach. Palanga is a seaside resort town located along the Baltic Sea. Nearby places of interest include Tyszkiewicz Palace, the Palanga Amber Museum, the Palanga Botanical Garden and the Anaiciai Ethnographic Cemetery. Palanga bus station is located in the vicinity, providing access to other popular regional destinations. The hotel occupies a modern mid-rise property with a classic interior, which features a mural by local artist Juozas Vosylius. Facilities include a plunge pool, whirlpool and steam room. Massages are available on request. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Standard rooms are 30sqm and decorated in a bright, classic style with light wood furniture. Amenities include a satellite TV, large sitting area, work desk and en-suite bathroom. The restaurant offer European dishes in a relaxed and cosy setting, while guests can enjoy a range of drinks and snacks at the hotel bar, which features a summer terrace. A buffet breakfast is provided every morning and there are plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. Free parking is possible onsite. The hotel has a 24-hour reception.
